Title: Daredevil
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Steven S. DeKnight, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Bob Gunton
Plot: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy, and Karen are forced to play their end games.
